sub_title: Consultant / systems scientist in IWRM, climate change, and water-energy-food-ecosystems nexus
summary:
Integrated management of water and natural resources in a changing climate is my core business. Water for nature, water for people, water for economy. Currently in the roles of Team Leader and Project Principal on the National Drainage Programme, Phase 3, and the Joint Integrated Sector Approach for investment planning in the water sector of Egypt. 

Expertise: IWRM in response to Climate Change, investment planning, knowledge management, Monitoring & Evaluation (M&E).

As deputy team leader I looked after M&E, planning, and general management of the programme.', 'title': 'Water Management Specialist / Deputy Team Leader', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 165743, 'name': 'Rijkswaterstaat', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQGhKYCGmWAZCg/company-logo_400_400/0/1624689283990?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=xYvKe_Drq1BlhEB1yhpGiMPr4sUv4h3nwaVOwy8edy0', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/rijkswaterstaat/', 'employees': {'start': 5001, 'end': 10000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2010}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': None, 'date': {'start': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2010}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}}, 'company': 'Rijkswaterstaat', 'description': 'Detached to the national water management authority Rijkswaterstaat, as technical manager for floodplain measures near Arnhem (Meinerswijk), to enhance flood protection for 4 million people in The Netherlands.', 'title': 'Technical Manager Room for the River', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Aqua Integra Consult', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2006}, 'end': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2009}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': None, 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2006}, 'end': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2009}}, 'company': 'Aqua Integra Consult', 'description': 'As a freelance consultant I was hired by large international consultancy companies, nationally operating consultancy companies (engineering companies) and public organisations (municipalities, water boards, provinces, ministries), all in the field of water management and nature management.

My expertise comprises EU´s Water Framework Directive (in Dutch: Kaderrichtlijn Water), data management, ecology, water quality, treatment wetlands (helofytenfilters), river basin management and integrated water resources management, urban water management, as well as Natura 2000 and biodiversity conservation monitoring.', 'title': 'Consultant International Water Management', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Euroconsult Mott MacDonald', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2006}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2007}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Odessa, Ukraine', 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2006}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2007}}, 'company': 'Euroconsult Mott MacDonald', 'description': 'In the Lower Dnistr basin in Ukraine I guided the design and development of GIS based databases for storage of water quality and aquatic ecology data. In addition I guided the development of the biodiversity GIS database on the wetlands of the Dnistr Delta and Dnistrovsky Liman (estuary lake). Local ecologist were hired to perform field surveys and ultra-light aircraft surveys. The biodiversity database adheres to IUCN, RAMSAR, and national (protected) species lists. The databases were developed in MS SQL, complete with data entry forms and import tools based on Excel field forms. Dynamic Atlas software was used to present monitoring data on the web.

The project was financed by EU and implemented jointly with the Odessa II Mechnikov University and several sub contractors. Beneficiary was the Odessa Oblast Administration.', 'title': 'Key Expert ecology and data management', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 5840, 'name': 'ARCADIS', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/D560BAQFAyhh51gC9dw/company-logo_400_400/0/1688175751520?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=v_A65A8xn3xEkrQE2h_oF8q1CQO3ZAlQAu_vGDKEtDA', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/arcadis/', 'employees': {'start': 10001, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2000}, 'end': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2006}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': None, 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2000}, 'end': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2006}}, 'company': 'Arcadis', 'description': 'As senior project leader (project manager) and senior specialist I conducted many projects in the following fields:
-integrated water management
-water quality
-hydrology
-sewerage systems
-treatment wetlands
-urban water management
-rural water management
-surface water
-groundwater
-urban water plans (integrated plans comprising all aspects of water and spatial planning)
-development of water systems and policy for new urban and industrial areas

Moreover I was responsible for acquisition of new projects and was leader of the surface water and groundwater experts.', 'title': 'senior project leader / senior specialist water', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'ARCADIS-Euroconsult', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2004}, 'end': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2005}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': None, 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2004}, 'end': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2005}}, 'company': 'ARCADIS-Euroconsult', 'description': "As Team Leader for the Phare project 'Ecological Survey of Surface Waters, Hungary', financed by EU and the government of Hungary, I lead a team of international and national experts. In this project, based in Budapest, Hungary, our team conducted a hydrobiological survey in nearly 400 surface water bodies throughout Hungary. We introduced sampling methods in conformity with the EC Water Framework Directive. ECOSURV (the abbreviation of the project title) was the first project in EU to provide a national overview of the ecology of surface water bodies, all monitored with the same, standardised methods and techniques. It provided the Ministry of Environment and Water of Hungary with unique information about the current status of their water bodies.

The project was carried out together with DHI Water from Denmark, Mott MacDonald from UK, and BioAqua Pro from Hungary.

Euroconsult belonged to the ARCADIS group during this project, but now is part of Mott MacDonald group.", 'title': 'Team Leader', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 164058, 'name': 'Grontmij', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQGeCkFa1WCTAA/company-logo_400_400/0/1519886086460?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=fFjLSMsPhJq_VhobxSZlJqtxO2a744TOljuJCnbSoqA', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/grontmij/', 'employees': {'start': 10001, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 1996}, 'end': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2000}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': None, 'date': {'start': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 1996}, 'end': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2000}}, 'company': 'Grontmij Group', 'description': 'As specialist Water Quality I conducted many projects in the field of urban integrated water management, with a strong focus on modelling of water systems (hydrology and water quality), reporting on the outcomes, and advising clients (municipalities, water boards) on water management.', 'title': 'Specialist Water Quality', 'employment_type': None}]}]
